data.short_description: Long username with a nickname gets cut off for the mini profile
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your user settings and change your username to a very long name like `WWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW` - Open any server and give yourself a nickname there (any nickname works) - Open the mini profile (e.g. click on your account in the member list) - Observe it
